tp:treatment-sec.p: † Groenlandaspididae Obruchev 1964b: 143 (family) † Gronlandaspis Heintz 1932 [ type genus as † Groenlandaspis , name must be corrected Art. 32.5.3 and 32.5.2.1; type genus corrected to † Gronlandaspis by Snitting & Blom 2009: 269 ]
†Tiaraspididae Miles 1969: 125 , 145 (family) † Tiaraspis Gross 1962 [name only, published after 1960, not available, Art. 13.1.1; family name sometimes seen as †Tiaraspidae]
